alert.note: Alert for Banner; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:41PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Kimball, southwestern Banner and northeastern Laramie Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 140 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles east of Whitaker to 8 miles north of Pine Bluffs. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albin and Gun Barrel. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 3 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
